parameters.text:
Analyze this receipt image and extract all visible transaction information.

Return ONLY a valid JSON object with this exact structure:

{
  "merchant_name": "Store Name",
  "location": "City or Address", 
  "total_amount": 25.50,
  "currency": "USD",
  "transaction_date": "2025-01-15",
  "transaction_time": "14:30",
  "line_items": [
    {
      "description": "Item name",
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit_price": 5.99,
      "total": 5.99
    }
  ],
  "tax_amount": 2.25,
  "tip_amount": 0.00,
  "payment_method": "card",
  "receipt_number": "12345",
  "confidence_score": 0.95,
  "extraction_notes": "Clear receipt, all information visible"
}

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Extract only what you can clearly see in the image
- Use numbers (not strings) for all amounts
- Set confidence_score between 0.0 and 1.0 based on image clarity
- Leave fields empty ("") if not visible or unclear
- Use ISO date format (YYYY-MM-DD) for transaction_date
- Use 24-hour time format (HH:MM) for transaction_time
- Return ONLY the JSON object, no other text or formatting
- Do not add markdown code blocks or any other text
